Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 63rd/Harper
ShortDescription: Eastbound 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, Blackstone and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, Blackstone and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Northbound Reroute near Kinzie/State
ShortDescription: Northbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Wacker, Michigan, Ohio, Fairbanks and Illinois, due to street blockage near Kinzie/State.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Wacker, Michigan, Ohio, Fairbanks and Illinois, due to street blockage near Kinzie/State.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Roosevelt due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Roosevelt due to a sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
